features: 【Dual Mini Microphones for iPhone】This dual mini microphone set 2.4G ultra-low delay built-in noise reduction chip, real-time auto-sync technology, and crystal clear sound. The mini microphone can easily cope with various noisy environments and truly restore human voices.

【Plug AND Play】 This innovative mini microphone is much easier to set. No Adapter, Bluetooth or Application needed. No need to spend precious time on complex configurations or dealing with tangled wires. Simply connect the receiver to your recording device, attach the transmitters, and you're ready to go. Our user-friendly design allows you to focus on what matters most, your content - while enjoying seamless and reliable wireless performance.

【WIDE SIGNAL RANGE】The extended signal range can enhance the mobility of mini microphone. Enjoy the freedom of movement during your recordings or presentations. The mini microphone impressive 65FT transmission distance,microphone for iPhone grants you the flexibility to move around without being tethered by cumbersome cables. Whether you're conducting an interview, or recording a vlog, the wireless design ensures you stay connected with your audience, enhancing your overall performance.

【BATTERY POWERED】Stay powered up for extended periods with the microphone's long-lasting battery life. The receiver's large capacity battery enables long usage for up to 5 hours on a single charge. The system of wireless microphones for iPhone is designed with on-the-go charging capability, allowing you to recharge the receiver while using.

【Versatility in Compatibility: iOS Device Support】 Designed to be compatible with iOS devices. Note: the iPad with type-c interface CANNOT be used, and it can NOT be used with Android devices. Please test after receiving, if you have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us, we will reply to your question as soon as possible. We are committed to doing the best quality products and services for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AOOCN Wireless Microphone for iPhone, iPad - Plug-Play Wireless Lavalier Microphone 2.4G Ultra-Low Delay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 10 year old wanted mini microphones to do interviews with lol! I said okay got on and did some research! I found these! They are very sturdy and come with a charger! Plus there are 2 of them!! Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to connect and clear sound
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I am in a business where I go live on Facebook quite a lot. I liked this particular set because it has two mics so if a second person joins me in the kitchen we can both have good sound.The sound using this Bluetooth mic is super clear, I don’t have to worry about if I walk away from my camera a little or move around the kitchen (I make cooking videos) that my viewers won’t be able to hear me. What’s cool is it picks up my sound, but things like my kids in another room or the tv doesn’t get picked up, making it a much cleaner and clearer sound for my followers.The mic clips easily on a kind of shirt and picks up a lot, in a good way. I like its plug and play basically. I just put the adaptor into my charger port on my phone and turn on the mic and it’s ready to go. (As long as Bluetooth is on )I use this several times a week with no issues with cutting out or sound issues and my viewers can hear me better and appreciate that greatly. It’s easy to charge and the battery life lasts quite a while, so that’s nice as well. So far, after many uses, the mic clip has held up well (some can be cheaply made, this isn’t one of them) and I’m overall happy with sound quality and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter needed a set of mic's for a school project she was creating. Finding ones for Apple were not as easy as I thought it would be, but this pair works almost perfectly. Her only issue was that she found it difficult to connect to both the mics and hear headset simultaneously. She ended up figuring it out, but it was a little challenging to get both running at the same time. I don't know if this was an issue with the mics, with the headphones, or with her model phone, so I'm not taking any stars off for it from the mics. But, I did want to mention it. Otherwise the sound is great, the bluetooth distance is good, and the battery length is sufficient for her projects! We're calling this a very good value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are delightful!
reviews.reviewText: These look great and are so unobtrusive. Very subtle and easy to pin on the lapel or collar. Mind you that these really shine from a distance. If you are using this on a camera from a distance of 5 feet or less then you won’t be able to tell any difference. It’s more effective further away. Also having this particular pair package is ideal for sit down interviews or recording duets. Charging is easy and fast. Finally comes in a nice box which can serve as a carrying case!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound quality
reviews.reviewText: These worked well. They took some setting up. I had to troubleshoot the connection in the beginning. But once everything got connected these worked fine. They didn't drop connection. The sound quality was stable and consistent. No fluctuations.I do wish the battery lasted longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little lavalier mic works great with iPhone! The sound quality on phone and video calls and video recording is high. Make sure not to get this if your phone isn't an iPhone, it doesn't look like you can use an adapter with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly. Exactly what I needed. do not need to download any apps or change any settings to use the microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality recording and sound
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, very quick, picks up sound very nice, actually better than expected, compact size is perfect for what is needed for, sound is nice and clear, easy set up, overall great quality product
